channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8272] make compaction checker frequency configurable per table/cf
item.description: Makes the compaction checker frequency configurable per table/cf; that is useful for compaction schemes where many compactions can be available at any time, so the default checks/requests that HBase performs may be insufficient.
item.summary: make compaction checker frequency configurable per table/cf

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: simple patch. The multiplies is rename to more specific value and moved to store; thread checks it instead of waking on unified multiplier.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12577075/HBASE-8272-v0.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

This message is automatically generated.

+  private long compactionCheckMultiplier;

Do we need a long above ? How about an int ?


+    this.compactionCheckMultiplier = conf.getLong(COMPACTCHECKER_INTERVAL_MULTIPLIER_KEY, 1000);

Should we check that the multiplier isn't 0 ? If it is 0, we would have arithmetic exception here:


+            if (iteration % multiplier != 0) continue;
CR feedback

ping?

Some nit:


+    if (this.compactionCheckMultiplier <= 0) {

+      LOG.error("Compaction check period multiplier must be positive, setting default");

Please put the default value in log above.


-   * Gets the Memstore flush size for the region that this store works with.

    * TODO: remove after HBASE-7236 is fixed.

HBASE-7236 has been fixed.


+   *         will be ascertained every multiplier * HConstants.THREAD_WAKE_FREQUENCY

The sentence seems to be incomplete.
Updated, also rebased. The HBASE-7236 was resolved without final optional child item, updated the comment

+1 on patch v3.

Thanks for the quick response.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue: hbase.server.compactchecker.interval.multiplier configuration setting was added to enable one to make more frequent compaction checks in the cluster, or in specific regions. See hbase-default.xml for details.
